rules.description: Neo2 mod 3 and 4 keys (Apple keyboards). Rule applied to Apple-made keyboards only.
Neo2 mod 3 and 4 keys (third party Mac keyboard). Rule applied to all keyboards.
Neo2 mod 3 and 4 keys (Windows keyboard). Rule applied to all non-Apple keyboards.
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Tab acts as Ctrl if pressed with another key
Prevent problematic keys (?, /, #, =, and ')') from being treated as option key shortcut
Prevent all layer 3 keys from being treated as option key shortcut
Neo2 mod 4: Map ↖ to Home and ↘︎ to End in terminal apps (move this rule above the rule 'Neo2 layer 4').
